word:
MR No. 1408 - Conditions in Takoma Park and Battle Creek; God's People to Fulfill the Gospel Commission; Stand Apart From Those Who Undermine Present Truth
 
     [Written July 14, 1904, at Takoma Park, Washington, D.C., to "Dear Brother Butler."] 


     I began a letter to you a day or so ago, but I cannot find it, so will begin another without spending more time in looking.
